description.0: A bell crafted of deep sapphire and sterling silver. Its echoes are as crisp as they are distant.

0.0: Normal Attack SPD is increased by <cryo>10%</cryo>. After the wielder unleashes an Elemental Skill, Normal Attack DMG will increase by <cryo>4.8%</cryo> every second for 14s. After hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack during this duration, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>9.6%</cryo>. This increase can be triggered once every 0.3s. The maximum Normal Attack DMG increase per single duration of the overall effect is <cryo>48%</cryo>. The effect will be removed when the wielder leaves the field, and using the Elemental Skill again will reset all DMG buffs.

After hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack during this duration, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>12%</cryo>. This increase can be triggered once every 0.3s. The maximum Normal Attack DMG increase per single duration of the overall effect is <cryo>60%</cryo>. The effect will be removed when the wielder leaves the field, and using the Elemental Skill again will reset all DMG buffs.

4.0: Normal Attack SPD is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>. After the wielder unleashes an Elemental Skill, Normal Attack DMG will increase by <cryo>9.6%</cryo> every second for 14s. After hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack during this duration, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>19.2%</cryo>. This increase can be triggered once every 0.3s. The effect will be removed when the wielder leaves the field, and using the Elemental Skill again will reset all DMG buffs.
